name: Adventures of Lincoln
description:
Adventures of Lincoln is a top-down style adventure/puzzle game created by Sleepless Knights. The goal of the game is to lead Lincoln home before dark, by solving a series of puzzles while progressing through the maze-like layout of the Lost Woods, and keeping Lincoln warm.

Keyboard and Xbox controller compatible.

Sleepless Knights

Sleepless Knights is a group of six students studying Game Development at Niagara College Canada.

Programmers:

  • Blake Arney
  • Joseph Boucher

Artists:

  • Michael Aitken
  • Mack Cornelisse
  • Garrett Finlay
  • Andrew Kornelsen

Designers:

  • Michael Aitken
  • Blake Arney
  • Joseph Boucher
  • Mack Cornelisse
  • Andrew Kornelsen
